desc: Explore the Salt of the Earth Range of Natural Products. Sustainable and Award Winning Deodorants and Hand Washes that Comprise 100% Natural Ingredients and are Approved by the Vegetarian and Vegan Societies. Deodorants available in Spray, Roll-On, Crystal, Balm and Refill Formats.

layout.text:
THE ORIGINAL,
100% NATURAL,
LONG LASTING DEODORANT.
